post_detail.description:
For VH1's Pepsi Super Bowl Fan Jam, we created a show package that embraced the energy of fans at a sold out concert.  Our show open starts from the idea of a pulsing speaker that is front and centerstage, generating a metallic world of football helmets, guitars and microphones, and ultimately revealing a stadium full of fans.

The full show package consisted of mortises, lower thirds, a bug,
bumps, transitions, background beds, package headers and a promo to
tease the big event. C3X worked closely with VH1 to ensure that the
integrity of Pepsi, the Super Bowl and VH1's brands were met without
sacrificing quality of content.
post_detail.title: Pepsi Fan Jam
